title: Gift Republic SH01309 Movie Trivia
features: Test your knowledge of movies through the decades
A fun game for parties and gatherings
Item Package Dimension: 2.5cm L x 9.5cm W x 13.5cm H
Great gift idea for movie buffs. A great portable quiz that is perfect for taking along on holiday or trips. Sure to keep everyone engaged and the discussion flowing
description: From the manufacturer Trivia Card Packs -100 Tricky Questions On All Sorts of Topics Discover our range of fun, engaging trivia card packs. These boxed sets of 100 question and answer cards are perfect as a gift or bought to keep everyone entertained. They all come in a handy box and are great for taking along on holiday, day trips and when on long journeys. They fit easily into your pocket or bag and provide hours of entertainment. Test your knowledge on a range of specialist subjects or try some more general knowledge questions and get the discussion going. A great Secret Santa gift or stocking filler. These cards are perfect as a gift to give for any occasion and are always appreciated. Quality card with well researched questions and just so you aren't left scratching your head they feature the answer too so you can put a stop to the argument! Fun For All Ages These boxes of 100 trivia questions make a great gift and are perfect for social gatherings.
